org.apache.mina.statemachine.transition

Class MethodSelfTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mina.statemachine.transition.AbstractSelfTransition
      • org.apache.mina.statemachine.transition.MethodSelfTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelfTransition

    public class MethodSelfTransition
extends AbstractSelfTransition
    SelfTransition which invokes a Method. The Method can have zero or any number of StateContext and State regarding order

    Normally you wouldn't create instances of this class directly but rather use the SelfTransition annotation to define the methods which should be used as transitions in your state machine and then let org.apache.mina.statemachine create a StateMachine for you.

    Author:
    Apache MINA Project
